string.value: |What a strange thing... It's like a mark. No wonder people are afraid: I'm feeling uneasy here myself. I'd better go and report this phenomenon to Midgard.
BANDIT|Well-well, who's coming to see us?
LISA|You? What are you doing here? You ruined everythi... I mean... thank you for the miraculous rescue.
|I saved you, Lisa. Now you will give me answers - I need to know who killed my father!
LISA|What? Who? I have nothing to do with it. I didn't kill anybody! Don't you dare try to pin a bloody murder on me!
I'm not accusing you. At least not until I get all the facts.
LISA|Then why did you follow me all the way here?
I ask questions here! Answer me, who killed the villagers of Glukhoe? Who committed this atrocity? You went there after we parted, and you know what happened there!
LISA|So you, apparently... I mean... Sure, I was there when it happened, and I saw who did it.
|Tell me!

LISA|They were fighting for a new world order. The Crimson Dawn, that's what they called themselves. Ruthless killers from the west. Normally they don't travel outside of their own country, but now they have begun their expansion into neighboring regions.
|How do you know so much about them?
LISA|I travel the world a lot, looking for new ways to... new technologies. I've been all over the map.
|But I still don't understand why they would kill innocent people?
LISA|It's a standard tactic. They'll make a few surprise raids. And when the populace panics, they'll show up and offer their protection. Not for free, of course.
|What a disgrace! I won't let them get their filthy hands on my homeland! I'll kill them all!
LISA|Don't get too worked up, among these bandits there are those who went to the army to save their families from starvation. There are also those who were forced and intimidated.
LISA|In fact, only one man is truly responsible - the leader, Axel. The entire evil empire hinges on his iron will. If he is eliminated, the mighty force will crumble like a house of cards.
|You're right, the one who gave the order should be held accountable. Axel will be defeated!
LISA|You should know that getting to him is very, very difficult. And you will have to act not so much by brute force as by deception.
|I can handle it. Just show me the way.
LISA|There's only one way I’m aware of: the tunnel under the mountains. Ask somebody in Asgard, they will show it to you. Farewell, hero!
|Goodbye. Thanks for the help.
ORATOR|The battle begins!
ORATOR|Let the battle begin!
|The victory is mine! As well as rare alloy!
You failed to protect the caravan.
Do you wish to travel to another region?
|I don't know where this road leads, so I'll stay here.
There’s something strange about this place. Better to stay away from here.
